title: (6) BullDog Commercial Non-Handed Grade 2 Security Passage Lever in Oil Rubbed Bronze
item_description:
(6) BullDog Commercial Non-Handed Grade 2 Security Passage Lever in Oil Rubbed Bronze

  • Seller States: High Retail value 
  • Function (Passage):
    • Passage style knobs and levers are used to provide transition from one room to another. Both sides of the hardware are always free and have no locking mechanisms. Perfect for hallways, closets, guest rooms, or anywhere that doesn’t require a lock.
  • Features:
    • Meets all ADA Regulations
    • 156.2 Grade-2 ANSI/BHMA Certification
    • 3 hour, UL Labeled Fire Rated
    • Non-handed Design
    • Lifetime Mechanical Warranty, 2 Year Finish Warranty
    • Strike: 2-3/4" T-Strike
    • Rose Diameter: 3-3/8"
